body: I also assumed that `encoder.Indent("", "")` should pretty-print with each element on its own line with no indent rather than disabling pretty-print. I need to work with potentially big and rather nested XML.  For debugging and friendliness to diff I would like to save files with each element printed on its own line. However even with `Indent("", " ")` I got a significant increase in file size. I can work-around that with a regexp that strips initial spaces from each line with xml elements, but it would be nice if `Indent("", "")` worked as expected.
